Package backEnd

Class Player

java.lang.Object
backEnd.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
A player is the captain of the game
Author:
Aerinn Nguyen, Bede Skinner-Vennell

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(Ship ship, Island startingLocation, java.lang.String name, int days)
      Constructor of a player
      Parameters:
      ship - The ship the player chose
      startingLocation - The island the ship is currently based
      name - The name of the player
      days - The maximum of days that the player chose to play

    • checkItemPurchase

      public boolean checkItemPurchase​(Item item, int price)
      Check if the player can afford to buy and store the item
      Parameters:
      item - The item that the player wants to buy
      price - the price of the item
      Returns:
      true (if yes) or throws the respective error otherwise

    • checkWeaponPurchase

      public boolean checkWeaponPurchase​(Weapon weapon, int price)
      Check if the player can afford to buy and store the weapon
      Parameters:
      weapon - The weapon that the player wants to buy
      price - the price of the weapon
      Returns:
      true (if yes) or throws the respective error otherwise

      public boolean checkRoute​(Route route)

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • setSail

      public EventInfo setSail​(Route route, Island destination)
      Player takes a route to travel to an island with probability of random events
      Parameters:
      route - The chosen route to take
      destination - The island the player wants to travel to
      Returns:
      The information about the event that occurred, if any
